The cause needs the help of the old hands, the aged workers, who have had many years' experience in the cause of God; who have seen many going into fanaticism, cherishing the delusion of false theories, and resisting all the efforts made to let the true light shine forth in the darkness to reveal the superstitions that were coming in to 
                                                                           225
confuse judgment, and to make of none effect the message of truth that in these last days must be given in its purity to the remnant people of God.
